channel.title: Brackets on Python Brackets
channel.description: Recent content in Brackets on Python Brackets

item.title: Python Brackets Jupyter Kernel
item.description: Today we published a Jupyter kernel to add Brackets support to Jupyter, so from now on you can use Jupyter’s qtconsole and Jupyter’s notebooks with Python Brackets. To install you can do pip install ibpykernel and after install is finished python -m ibpykernel install --user and to use it with notebook jupyter notebook and it’s available in create file menu You can view this project on PyPI or on Github.
